pjack@... wrote:
> 
> 
>  > This code looks like it will be a big help, though. Man, it sure is
>  > complicated...
> 
> Yes, an embedded Heritrix should be controllable via the objects' APIs and
> not only via JMX. I just committed some changes to enable that. These
> changes will be included in release 2.0.1, but if you'd like to help us
> test them earlier than that, they are in trunk/heritrix2.

Aaarghh!!!  I somehow missed this e-mail and spent the last couple days 
pouring through the WebUI code trying to puzzle out how the Remote, JMX, 
BeanProxy, and the rest could be used to cobble together a working 
embeddable Heritrix.  Using the straight up API will be a big 
improvement for me.

I guess I'll switch to running off the trunk and see where that gets me. 
  Bleeding edge, here I come.

Thanks,
Micah
